    • Method Detail

      • addTupleToAchievement

        public boolean addTupleToAchievement(java.lang.String title,
                            java.lang.String description,
                            int prerequisite,
                            int points)
                              throws DatabaseException
        Adds an achievement to the ACHIEVEMENTS table.
        Parameters:
        title - A String. A short title for the achievement (unique/primary key).
        description - A String describing the achievement.
        prerequisites - The id of an achievement that must be completed prior to this one.
        points - An integer. The number of points associated to the completion of this achievement.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException

      • removeTupleFromAchievement

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        DatabaseException
